Translations.Text: Achalume niŵali ŵakwajimila achakongwe (ŵalume ni ntwe weŵasa), ligongo lyanti Allah ŵachimbichisye ŵane mwa jamanjao kwapunda ŵane (achalume kwapunda achakongwe), soni ligongo lya chipanje chao chaakuŵa ali nkutola. Sano achimmasyeto ŵambone niŵali ŵakumanya, ŵakuligosa (yilu yao nigosa yipanje yaliŵasa) atamuno achiŵammakwao pali pangali, ligongo lyanti Allah ŵagosile (achimmasyetowo kupitila mwa achiŵammakwao ŵaakwapaga yaakulajila). Sano aŵala (achimmasyeto) ŵankukujogopa kuliikwesya kwao basi mwajamukani, (naga ngaakupikana) mwawunduchilani pagona, (naga kuunduka ngakukamuchisya) mwaputani (kwangaulasya), sano naga ali nkumpikanila, basi ngasimwasosela matala (gakwalagachisya). Chisimu Allah ni jwaali Jwapenani kusyene, Jwankulungwa nnope

Sano naga (jenumanja akwiilanya) nkuujogopa ukangani wauli chilikati chao (ŵalume ni ŵankwao), basi tumisyani namangoswe jwakuchilume ni namangoswe jwakuchikongwe (kuti akachengulanye), naga ŵanaŵaŵiliwo ali asachile kwilanya, Allah tiŵakombolasye, chisimu Allah aŵele Jwakumanyilila nnope, Jwaasimanya abali syosope

Soni mun'galagatilani Allah ni nkam'bwanganyaga ni chilichose, nombe achinangolo ŵanaŵaŵili mwatendelani yambone, kwisa soni ŵaulongo, ŵawina, masikini, jwakuŵandikana najo nyumba niali jwaulongo, jwakuŵandikana najo nyumba niali mundu nsape, n'jenu jwakutama najo imo, jwapaulendo ni (mateeka) gagapatile magasa genu gakun'dyo. Chisimu Allah ngakasaŵanonyela aŵala ŵali ŵakulikwesya ni kuliiti
Aŵala ŵaakutenda ubayili ni kwachisyaga soni ŵandu kutenda ubayili, ni akusisaga yaŵapele Allah kuumila mu ukoto Wakwe. Ni twalinganyichiisye achimakafili ilagasyo yakwalusya
